entries.name: Eyes of Eirdu
entries: You and allies within 10 feet of you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Faerie Fire
entries: You learn the {@spell Faerie Fire|XPHB} spell. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell (choose when you select this feat). You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.
When you cast {@spell Faerie Fire|XPHB} without a spell slot using this benefit, taking damage can't break your {@status Concentration|XPHB} on the spell.

entries.name: Hex
entries: You always have the {@spell Hex|XPHB} spell prepared. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell (choose when you select this feat). You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.

entries.name: Curse Magic
entries: When a creature that you've cursed with {@spell Hex|XPHB} hits you with an attack roll, the creature takes Psychic damage equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}. A creature takes this damage only once per turn.
